languages.text: "Все должно было быть иначе. Твое выступление должно было стать уроком вежливости, а не объявлением войны! Ты убил{mf||а} бы кого-нибудь неважного, пустил{mf||а} бы кровь их тщеславию. Ведьмы получили бы твою голову как лекарство для их раненой гордости и на какое-то время запомнили, что я еще способен доставить им неприятности. Но вы все меня подвели! Кикеросс нарушила обещание, а ты не сдох{mf||ла} в ее ловушке! Это вы виноваты в том, что ситуация вышла из-под контроля".

"It was supposed to go differently. Your performance was supposed to be a lesson in respect, not a declaration of war! You would have killed someone unimportant and made the Wyches' vanity bleed. The Wyches would have received your head as a salve for their wounded pride. They would have been reminded for a time that I was still someone who could greatly complicate their existence. Instead, you have failed me, all of you! Keykeross did not keep her word, and you did not die in her trap! It is all your fault that things have spiralled out of control."
languages.original_text: "Все должно было быть иначе. Твое выступление должно было стать уроком вежливости, а не объявлением войны! Ты убил{mf||а} бы кого-нибудь неважного, пустил{mf||а} бы кровь их тщеславию. Ведьмы получили бы твою голову как лекарство для их раненой гордости и на какое-то время запомнили, что я еще способен доставить им неприятности. Но вы все меня подвели! Кикеросс нарушила обещание, а ты не сдох{mf||ла} в ее ловушке! Это вы виноваты в том, что ситуация вышла из-под контроля".

traits.locale_text: "It was supposed to go differently. Your performance was supposed to be a lesson in respect, not a declaration of war! You would have killed someone unimportant and made the Wyches' vanity bleed. The Wyches would have received your head as a salve for their wounded pride. They would have been reminded for a time that I was still someone who could greatly complicate their existence. Instead, you have failed me, all of you! Keykeross did not keep her word, and you did not die in her trap! It is all your fault that things have spiralled out of control."

languages.text: 「もっと違う状況になると思っていたのだがな。お前のパフォーマンスは、宣戦布告ではなく、敬意を示すための講義となるはずだったのだ！お前はさして重要でもない誰かを殺し、ウィッチのうぬぼれを血に塗れさせたはずだった。ウィッチは傷ついた誇りを慰めるために、お前の首を狙ったことだろう。そして奴らは、己の存在を困難にさせ得る、大いなる存在たる私のことをしばしの間記憶に刻みつけるはずだった。そうはならなかった。お前は私を裏切ったのだ！キーケロスは約束を破り、お前は彼女の罠にかかって生命を落とさなかった！状況が制御できなくなったのは、すべてお前のせいだ！」
languages.original_text: "It was supposed to go differently. Your performance was supposed to be a lesson in respect, not a declaration of war! You would have killed someone unimportant and made the Wyches' vanity bleed. The Wyches would have received your head as a salve for their wounded pride. They would have been reminded for a time that I was still someone who could greatly complicate their existence. Instead, you have failed me, all of you! Keykeross did not keep her word, and you did not die in her trap! It is all your fault that things have spiralled out of control."

traits.locale_text: 「もっと違う状況になると思っていたのだがな。お前のパフォーマンスは、宣戦布告ではなく、敬意を示すための講義となるはずだったのだ！お前はさして重要でもない誰かを殺し、ウィッチのうぬぼれを血に塗れさせたはずだった。ウィッチは傷ついた誇りを慰めるために、お前の首を狙ったことだろう。そして奴らは、己の存在を困難にさせ得る、大いなる存在たる私のことをしばしの間記憶に刻みつけるはずだった。そうはならなかった。お前は私を裏切ったのだ！キーケロスは約束を破り、お前は彼女の罠にかかって生命を落とさなかった！状況が制御できなくなったのは、すべてお前のせいだ！」

languages.text: “事情本不该演变成这种结果。你这场表演的本意，是教会他们如何尊重我，根本不是和他们开战！你只要杀掉他们手下不太重要的角色，让那些巫灵尝个教训就够了。这样一来，那些巫灵只要摘了你的脑袋，就算是找回了面子。在接下来的很长时间里，她们都会明白最好别惹我，否则我会给她们带来相当头疼的麻烦。可实际上呢？你辜负了我！你们所有人都辜负了我！绮克萝丝没有遵守诺言，你也没有死在她的陷阱里。事情变得这么失去控制，全都是你们的错。”
languages.original_text: "It was supposed to go differently. Your performance was supposed to be a lesson in respect, not a declaration of war! You would have killed someone unimportant and made the Wyches' vanity bleed. The Wyches would have received your head as a salve for their wounded pride. They would have been reminded for a time that I was still someone who could greatly complicate their existence. Instead, you have failed me, all of you! Keykeross did not keep her word, and you did not die in her trap! It is all your fault that things have spiralled out of control."

traits.locale_text: “事情本不该演变成这种结果。你这场表演的本意，是教会他们如何尊重我，根本不是和他们开战！你只要杀掉他们手下不太重要的角色，让那些巫灵尝个教训就够了。这样一来，那些巫灵只要摘了你的脑袋，就算是找回了面子。在接下来的很长时间里，她们都会明白最好别惹我，否则我会给她们带来相当头疼的麻烦。可实际上呢？你辜负了我！你们所有人都辜负了我！绮克萝丝没有遵守诺言，你也没有死在她的陷阱里。事情变得这么失去控制，全都是你们的错。”

languages.text: « Ce n'était pas censé se passer comme ça. Votre petite prestation était censée être une leçon de respect, pas une déclaration de guerre ! Vous auriez tué quelqu'un d'insignifiant et porté un coup fatal à la vanité des Cérastes. Les Cérastes auraient accepté votre tête pour panser leur fierté blessée. Pour un temps, cela leur aurait rappelé que je suis en position de compliquer leur existence. Pourtant, vous avez tous fait l'erreur de me décevoir ! Keykeross n'a pas tenu parole et vous n'avez pas succombé à son piège ! Si la situation a échappé à tout contrôle, c'est votre faute. »
languages.original_text: "It was supposed to go differently. Your performance was supposed to be a lesson in respect, not a declaration of war! You would have killed someone unimportant and made the Wyches' vanity bleed. The Wyches would have received your head as a salve for their wounded pride. They would have been reminded for a time that I was still someone who could greatly complicate their existence. Instead, you have failed me, all of you! Keykeross did not keep her word, and you did not die in her trap! It is all your fault that things have spiralled out of control."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'était pas censé se passer comme ça. Votre petite prestation était censée être une leçon de respect, pas une déclaration de guerre ! Vous auriez tué quelqu'un d'insignifiant et porté un coup fatal à la vanité des Cérastes. Les Cérastes auraient accepté votre tête pour panser leur fierté blessée. Pour un temps, cela leur aurait rappelé que je suis en position de compliquer leur existence. Pourtant, vous avez tous fait l'erreur de me décevoir ! Keykeross n'a pas tenu parole et vous n'avez pas succombé à son piège ! Si la situation a échappé à tout contrôle, c'est votre faute. »

languages.text: «Se suponía que esto iba a acabar de otro modo. ¡Se suponía que tus acciones serían una lección de respeto, no una declaración de guerra! Tú matabas a alguien insignificante, hiriendo la vanidad de las brujas. Las brujas recibían tu cabeza como bálsamo para su orgullo. Ellas recordarían durante un tiempo que sigo siendo capaz de complicarles mucho la existencia. Pero me has fallado. ¡Todos me habéis fallado! ¡Ni Keykeross ha cumplido su palabra ni tú has muerto en su trampa! Por vuestra culpa, las cosas se han descontrolado completamente».
languages.original_text: "It was supposed to go differently. Your performance was supposed to be a lesson in respect, not a declaration of war! You would have killed someone unimportant and made the Wyches' vanity bleed. The Wyches would have received your head as a salve for their wounded pride. They would have been reminded for a time that I was still someone who could greatly complicate their existence. Instead, you have failed me, all of you! Keykeross did not keep her word, and you did not die in her trap! It is all your fault that things have spiralled out of control."

Tú matabas a alguien insignificante, hiriendo la vanidad de las brujas. Las brujas recibían tu cabeza como bálsamo para su orgullo. Ellas recordarían durante un tiempo que sigo siendo capaz de complicarles mucho la existencia. Pero me has fallado. ¡Todos me habéis fallado! ¡Ni Keykeross ha cumplido su palabra ni tú has muerto en su trampa! Por vuestra culpa, las cosas se han descontrolado completamente».

languages.text: "Es sollte anders laufen. Eure Darbietung sollte eine Lektion in Sachen Respekt sein, keine Kriegserklärung! Ihr hättet jemand Unwichtigen töten und die Eitelkeit der Hekatari verletzen sollen. Dann hätten die Hekatari Euren Kopf als Salbe gegen ihren verletzten Stolz erhalten. Und dann hätten sie sich an eine Zeit erinnert, zu der ich noch jemand war, der ihnen das Leben ausgesprochen schwer machen konnte. Stattdessen habt Ihr mich alle enttäuscht, Ihr alle! Keykeross hat ihr Wort nicht gehalten und Ihr seid nicht in ihrer Falle gestorben. Es ist alles Eure Schuld, dass die Dinge außer Kontrolle geraten sind."
languages.original_text: "It was supposed to go differently. Your performance was supposed to be a lesson in respect, not a declaration of war! You would have killed someone unimportant and made the Wyches' vanity bleed. The Wyches would have received your head as a salve for their wounded pride. They would have been reminded for a time that I was still someone who could greatly complicate their existence. Instead, you have failed me, all of you! Keykeross did not keep her word, and you did not die in her trap! It is all your fault that things have spiralled out of control."

traits.locale_text: "Es sollte anders laufen. Eure Darbietung sollte eine Lektion in Sachen Respekt sein, keine Kriegserklärung! Ihr hättet jemand Unwichtigen töten und die Eitelkeit der Hekatari verletzen sollen. Dann hätten die Hekatari Euren Kopf als Salbe gegen ihren verletzten Stolz erhalten. Und dann hätten sie sich an eine Zeit erinnert, zu der ich noch jemand war, der ihnen das Leben ausgesprochen schwer machen konnte. Stattdessen habt Ihr mich alle enttäuscht, Ihr alle! Keykeross hat ihr Wort nicht gehalten und Ihr seid nicht in ihrer Falle gestorben. Es ist alles Eure Schuld, dass die Dinge außer Kontrolle geraten sind."

languages.text: "Sürecin farklı gelişmesi gerekiyordu. Performansının bir savaş ilanı değil, saygı konusunda bir ders olması gerekiyordu! Önemli olmayan birilerini öldürecek ve Viçlerin kibrine zarar verecektin. Viçler, yaralı gururlarının karşılığı olarak kelleni alacaktı. Bir zamanlar varoluşlarını komplike hâle getirebilecek biri olduğumu hatırlayacaklardı. Ancak başarısız oldunuz! Hepiniz! Keykeross sözünde durmadı, siz de onun tuzağında can vermediniz! Her şeyin kontrolden çıkmasının suçlusu sizsiniz."
languages.original_text: "It was supposed to go differently. Your performance was supposed to be a lesson in respect, not a declaration of war! You would have killed someone unimportant and made the Wyches' vanity bleed. The Wyches would have received your head as a salve for their wounded pride. They would have been reminded for a time that I was still someone who could greatly complicate their existence. Instead, you have failed me, all of you! Keykeross did not keep her word, and you did not die in her trap! It is all your fault that things have spiralled out of control."

traits.locale_text: "Sürecin farklı gelişmesi gerekiyordu. Performansının, saygı konusunda bir ders olması gerekiyordu, bir savaş ilanı değil! Önemli olmayan birilerini öldürecek ve Viçlerin kibrine zarar verecektin. Viçler yara almış gururlarının karşılığı olarak kelleni alacaktı. Bir zamanlar varoluşlarını komplike hâle getirebilecek biri olduğum onlara hatırlatılacaktı. Ama başarısız oldunuz! Hepiniz! Keykeross sözünde durmadı ve siz de onun tuzağında can vermediniz! Her şeyin kontrolden çıkmasının suçlusu sizsiniz."
